articles.description: England charge into the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup with a ruthless 10-wicket thrashing of the United States.

articles.description: Albania forward Mirlind Daku has been banned for two matches after leading his country's fans in derogatory chants.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Albania's Mirlind Daku given two-game ban for offensive chants

articles.description: Liverpool great Alan Hansen is discharged from hospital following illness, his former club has announced.
articles.title: Liverpool great Hansen discharged from hospital

articles.description: Britain's Andy Murray has not made a decision yet on whether he will play at Wimbledon, says Davis Cup captain Leon Smith.
articles.title: Andy Murray yet to decide if  he will play at Wimbledon 2024, says Leon Smith

articles.description: Jannik Sinner claims his first title as world number one with victory at the Halle Open, while Tommy Paul triumphs at Queen's.
articles.title: Halle Open: Jannik Sinner beats Hubert Hurkacz for first title as world number one

articles.description: Sha'Carri Richardson wins the women's 100m in world-leading time at the US Olympic trials to secure her place at this summer's Games in Paris.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Sha'Carri Richardson secures Team USA spot with world's fastest 100m of year

articles.description: Chelsea's new Brazilian signing Estevao Willian has been likened to Neymar and Lionel Messi.
articles.title: Chelsea: Estevao Willian has been compared to Neymar and Lionel Messi
